referenceObject.reference: Ribera, C., Ortuño, V. M., Jiménez-Valverde, A. & Domènech, M. (2025). Two new species of Cybaeodes Simon, 1878 (Araneae, Liocranidae) and description of the male of C. magnus Ribera & De Mas, 2015 from the MSS in the eastern Prebaetic Mountain Range (eastern Spain).
